title: Stomp Down Rider
content:
Stomp Down Rider is a rock and pop cover band from Toronto, known for their dynamic performances and captivating stage presence. The group formed back in 2018 and this powerful ensemble has been thrilling audiences across the GTA with their unique blend of multi-generational rock hits from the 1950s to present day. Stomp Down Rider is all about having a good time. Their fun-loving attitude makes their performances unique and unforgettable. Their performances arenâ€™t just concerts but lively celebrations where the audience is invited to sing-along and dance.

Visit the Casino Patio August 24th from 1:30pm to 5:30pm and August 25th from 7pm to 11pm to hear the vibrant music of Stomp Down Rider!

 

Concerts free with admission. Buy Now!
